text: Aragats Basketball Team, is a professional basketball team based in Yerevan, Armenia. It currently plays in the Armenia Basketball League A. ==History== Aragats was founded in 2018 for playing the Armenia Basketball League A. In its first season, the club won the league. ==Season by season== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%; text-align:center" !Season !Tier !Division !Pos. |- |bgcolor=#efefef|2018–19 | 1 || align=left|League A | bgcolor=gold|1st |- |} ==References== == External links == *Official Facebook account Category:Basketball teams in Armenia Category:Basketball teams established in 2018 Category:2018 establishments in Armenia
